page.title: 12Tourism
page.content:
Nestling between forested hills which present an ever changing panorama of colour as the skies and seasons change, this unexploited part of the Don valley has a timeless beauty and serenity which even the ceaseless heavy rain of 1985 cannot touch.
The silver Don meanders through the golden, brown and green countryside. Cattle, sheep and horses graze the pastures and deer can be glimpsed darting fleetingly through the trees. The rosy granite of houses and kirk blends easily with the unspoilt beauty.
Anglers and bird watchers return year after year to pursue their respective hobbies in ideal surroundings.
